def calculate_minimum_fine(n, marbles):
    marbles.sort()
    dp = [[float('inf'), float('inf')] for _ in range(n)]
    dp[0][2] = marbles[0][1]
    for i in range(1, n):
        dp[i][1] = min(dp[i][1], min(dp[i - 1]) + marbles[i][1])
        j = i - 1
        s = marbles[i][0]
        p = 1
        while j >= 0:
            dp[i][0] = min(dp[i][0], dp[j][1] + s - p * marbles[j][0])
            s += marbles[j][0]
            j -= 1
            p += 1
    return min(dp[n - 1])
